General.Name: Good Gaming Inc
General.Description: Good Gaming, Inc. operates tournament gaming platform and online destination targeting esports players and participants that want to compete at the high school or college level worldwide. It also develops MicroBuddies that combines Ethereum ERC721 non-fungible tokens (NFT), non-standard ERC20 tokens, and strategic gameplay to replicate and create NFTs. The company is based in Kennett Square, Pennsylvania.
General.Address: 415 McFarlan Road, Kennett Square, PA, United States, 19348
